title: Crime Alert 08.26.20
itunes:title: Crime Alert 08.26.20
description:
Convicted felon tried to get out of sentencing by faking death. Driver hits a pedestrian and takes off, with him on the hood.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
